definition: very red/red through and through/to blush (deep red)
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
Unicom Red Chip, Hong Kong subsidiary of China Unicom 中國聯通|中国联通
pinyin: Lian2 tong1 Hong2 chou2 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: He burst into the room red-faced and out of breath .
sentences.chinese: 他衝進房間，臉色通紅，氣喘吁吁。

sentences.english: His face was bright red, and he was 8)gasping for breath.
sentences.chinese: 他面色通紅，正艱難地喘着氣。

sentences.english: On the face often allergic , aglow, and what reason is easy desquamate?
sentences.chinese: 臉上經常過敏，通紅，而且容易脫皮是什麼原因呢？

sentences.english: When she heard this, she got red with anger.
sentences.chinese: 皇后聽到這些話時，氣得滿臉通紅。

sentences.english: His face crimsoned when he saw her.
sentences.chinese: 瑪姬感到很窘，接著臉色變得通紅。

sentences.english: Snow 'dappled his shoulders. His ears were red.
sentences.chinese: 他肩膀上落滿斑斑點點的雪花，耳朵凍得通紅。

sentences.english: He turned crimson under the insults.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉因受到侮辱而漲得通紅。

sentences.english: Her cheeks flamed when I spoke to her.
sentences.chinese: 當我與她說話時，她雙頰通紅。

sentences.english: Those of black smoke came damp, suddenly, the guy red sad.
sentences.chinese: 羞澀的眼色碰上受潮的煙，倏忽，哀愁的眼孔通紅。

sentences.english: His color rose to a heated red and his face was virtually unrecognizable.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉通紅，變得幾乎讓人認不出來了。

sentences.english: With reddened fingers deformed from a lifetime of hard work, the pedicurist labored on.
sentences.chinese: 修腳師用因一生辛勤勞作而變得通紅的手指工作着。

sentences.english: She stood before him, at the end of her speech, with her teeth clenched, her cheeks flaming.
sentences.chinese: 她講完話，站在他面前，咬緊牙關，雙頰通紅。

sentences.english: At this revelation, I started sobbing hysterically, my face turning bright red.
sentences.chinese: 聽他這麼一說，我立馬泣不成聲，臉也漲得通紅。

sentences.english: The night sky was reddened by the sweeping fire.
sentences.chinese: 漫天的大火把夜空映了個通紅。

sentences.english: He came into my room, his nose red with cold.
sentences.chinese: 他鼻子凍得通紅地走進房來。

sentences.english: Mrs May lie came back with her eyes red from crying.
sentences.chinese: 梅利夫人出來時兩眼哭得通紅。
